name: !batty

description: Put a fellow ottobot to bed. Goodnight!

description: Bah-rush me!

description: Chef Squad! Ah-ah-ah....

description: I see you like to dance....

description: ....I too like to dance....

description: Until Otto takes us all to Dinneyland....

description: Displays a link to Otto's Discord

description: The hottie host train
